infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The app needs access to your photos to let you upload road issue images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The app needs access to your camera to let you take photos of road issues.

plugins.photosPermission: The app needs access to your photos to let you upload road issue images.
